import React from 'react'; import TotalDisplay from './components/TotalDisplay'; import CalcButton from './components/CalcButton'; import { useReducer } from 'react'; import reducer,{initialState} from "./reducers"; import { addOne, applyNumber } from './actions'; function App() { const [state,dispatch]=useReducer(reducer,initialState); return (
Reducer Challenge
Operation:{state.operation} Memory:{state.memory}
dispatch(addOne())} value={1} /> dispatch({type:ADD_ONE})} value={2} /> dispatch({type:ADD_ONE})} value={3} />
dispatch({type:ADD_ONE})} value={4} /> dispatch({type:ADD_ONE})} value={5} /> dispatch({type:ADD_ONE})} value={6} />
dispatch({type:ADD_ONE})} value={7} /> dispatch({type:ADD_ONE})} value={8} /> dispatch({type:ADD_ONE})} value={9} />
); } export default App;
